name: dancer

effect.sun-moon: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

short_effect: Whenever another Pokémon uses a dance move, this Pokémon will use the same move immediately afterwards.

flavor_text.sun-moon: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: When another Pokémon uses a dance move, it can use a dance move following it regardless of its Speed.
